name: Noises by the campfire
description:
epilepsy warning: some flashing lights

themes from jam: noise, point-and-click

You're lost in the woods with a smokin' hot polygonal girl, but you two are not alone... 

How to play:

You need the fire to keep you warm, but the light it emits can attract unpleasant visitors. You have a bucket to cover the flames in case you hear them near, but keep it too long on the fire and it'll suffocate! If you hear footsteps, they aren't watching anymore.

Survive until 7 to win.

Controls:

Click the bucket to switch its position, click and hold on an unlit fire to light it up
